General.Name: KCC Corporation
General.Description: KCC Corporation provides building materials in South Korea and internationally. Its building materials include celling materials, insulation materials, gypsum board, and flooring materials. The company also offers window profiles, balcony window profiles, system window profiles, and sense doors; interior decorative materials, such as flooring materials and laminate films; float, functional, and automotive glass products; decorative, automotive, marine, plant, and industrial coatings; and organic and inorganic materials. In addition, it engages in silicone business for developing products in the fields of specialized paints and precision chemical engineering. KCC Corporation was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
